alert.note: Alert for Broome; Tioga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued March 14 at 4:14AM EDT until March 15 at 8:00AM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow. Total snow accumulations of 4 to 6 inches in lower elevation valleys, and 6 to 10 inches in higher elevations. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Tioga and Broome counties. * WHEN...Until 8 AM EDT Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions can be found at 511pa.com, or 511ny.org. Or, dial 5 1 1.
